p:
In the function, n, t 0 and t
i refer to number of dengue cases, start time of the simulation, and the interval of the transmission source. Considering that there was only one dengue case in community B during the outbreak, we simulated that a dengue case impulse into community A on 30 July, 2018. Therefore, n = 1, t 0 = 0, t
i = âˆž.
